title: Public Enemies
description: WANTED...Aiden and Meg Falconer have been crossing the country as fugitives in order to prove their parents didn't commit a crime. In a world where criminals are celebrities and news coverage is 24-7, the Falconers are finding it very hard to hide from their unwanted fame. They've been chased from state to state by the FBI... and by a killer they know only as Hairless Joe.Now Hairless Joe is getting closer than ever - and the Falconers are getting even closer to the truth....BY THE COPS AND A KILLER.
author: Gordon Korman
